column5: Nice hen.  I usually don't like keeping steelhead, but if she was full of eggs, I'd have to bag that one.
Great report and pic Vick Nice one!!  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Fresh steel and rusty metal! Looks like a bike gear. Nice catch!

sweet fish... yikes!     Look out for that Oshawa Luck Charm! Somebody's bike lost a part! lol!  :lol:  p.-  p.s. keep your chinooks for roe, most of them are stocked at least, and it works just as well (caught this one with chinney roe last weekend http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v11/paul...hn/PICT0194.jpg )... steelies get help only from you and me on this side of the border...
WTG Elusive!  That's a fine piece of steel.
It was too early in the morning to keep one, didn't want to walk around with it
I agree with you Paulus.  I only use chinny roe as well.  Works just as well.
